Name: Information asset audience
Definition: An attribute of an information asset signifying who it is intended for

children.Name: Legal professionals
children.Definition: People who do legal work and have or are seeking to develop some expertise there

children.Name: Business people
children.Definition: People who are not seeking to do legal work

children.Name: External
children.Definition: People outside this organisation, as well as those inside it

children.Name: Client
children.Definition: A specific client, or clients generally
children.Examples: Legal advice to a particular client

children.Name: Prospect
children.Definition: A prospective client, or prospective clients generally
children.Examples: Pitch contents targeted at a particular prospect

children.Name: Public
children.Definition: The world at large, including clients and prospects but also potential team members, media and anyone else
children.Examples: A website section, newsletter, blogpost or published article
